"Not to be confused with Cinema of Russia.

Film history of the Soviet Union

Cinema of

the Soviet Union

Russian Empire 1908–1917

List of Soviet films

1917–1929

1922 1923 1924 1925

1926 1927 1928 1929

1930s

1930 1931 1932 1933 1934

1935 1936 1937 1938 1939

1940s

1940 1941 1942 1943 1944

1945 1946 1947 1948 1949

1950s

1955 1956 1957 1958 1959
